verses.content: Rehoboam chu Jerusalem a hung tlung chun Benjamin le Juda sûngkuo, nuoi khat le sîng riet, thlang ṭhieu, Israelhai do dinga indo mi, Rehoboam ta dinga ram chu hung la kîr nâwk dingin a ko khâwm tawl a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi Semaia kuoma chun LALPA thu chu a hung tlung a,
“Judai ram lal Solomon naupa Rehoboam le, Judai rama Benjamin mihai le Israel mi po pohai kuoma chun thu hril la,

LALPAIN hieng hin a tih ti rawh, ‘Hang fe nâwng in ta, in unauhai chu indopui bawk nâwng in tih: mi tin chu mâni in sengah kîr nâwk el ro: hi thil hi keima thaw a ni sih a,’ tiin,” a ta. Chuongchun, LALPA thu chu an zâwm a, Jeroboam hang do tumnaa inthawk chun an kîr tah a.
Rehoboam chu Jerusalema chun a um a, Judai rama inhumhimna dingin khawpuihai a bâwl a.
Bethlehem dâm, Etam dâm, Tekoa dâm,
Beth-zur dâm, Soko dâm, Adullam dâm,
Gath dâm, Maresah dâm, Ziph dâm,
Adoraim dâm, Lakis dâm, Azeka dâm,
Zora dâm, Aijalon dâm, Hebron dâm, chuong chu Judai rama umhai le, Benjamin rama khawpui kul neihai a nih.
Chun, kul dettakhai chu a sukdet nâwk zuol a, chuonga chun hotuhai a sieh a, fâk ding le hriek le uoin dâm ân khâwl bawk a.
Khaw tin hmun tamtaka chun feihai, phâwhai a sieh a, nasatak- in a sukhrât a. Judai hnam le Benjamin hnam chu ama tieng an ṭhang a.
Levi mihai le thiempuhai chu an umna sûnga inthawk chun ama kuomah Israel ram sûng po poa chun an hung pakai a.

Levi mihai chun an ram le an khuohai chu an mâksan a, Jerusalem le Judai rama chun an hung a; Jeroboam le a naupasalhai chun anni chu LALPA ta dinga thiempu sinhai chu thaw lo dingin an hnawt suok sih a,
chuongchun, ama siem bâwng- têhai, kêlchalhai le bâwlhmunhaia ding chun thiempuhai a ruot fâwm tah a.
Chun, an hnunga khawm chun, Israel hnamhai lai po poa mi, Israel Pathien LALPA chu lungrila zawng- tuhai chun an zui a; an thlatuhai Pathien LALPA kuoma inthâwi ding chun Jerusalemah an hung hlak a.
Chuongchun, kum thum sûng chun Judai lalram chu an sukdet tiel tiel a, Solomon naupa Rehoboam chu ân sukdet hle el tah a; kum thum sûng chu David le Solomon lampui chu an hraw sih a.
Chun, Rehoboam chun David naupa Jerimoth le Jesai naupa Eliab naunu Abihail naunu Mahalath chu nuhmeiah a nei a;
amanu chun naupasalhai a neipêk a; Jeus le Semaria le Zaham.
Ama hnunga chun Absalom naunu Maaka chu a nei a; ama chun Abija, Attai, Ziza le Selomith a nei- pêk a.

Chun, Rehoboam chun a nu- hmeihai le a thaikêmhai po po nêkin Absalom naunu Maaka chu a hmangai lem a, (nuhmei chu sâwm- pariet a nei a, thaikêm sâwmruk leh; chun, naupasal sâwmhni pariet le naunuhmei sâwmruk a nei bawk sih a).
Chun, Rehoboam chun Maaka naupa Abija chu lalah, a unauhai laia hotutakah a ruot a; ama chu lala siem a lungril sih a.

Chun, vartakin a thawh a, Juda le Benjamin ram po poa chun a nau- pasalhai chu a semdar rak a, khaw- pui kul neihai po poa chun; fâk ding khawm tam tâwk takin a pêk bawk a. An ta dingin nuhmeihai khawm tamtak a zawngpêk bawk a.
